title: shrI dum durgE shiva
sahitya:
shrI dum durgE shiva samsargE cidrasavargE sthirEhApavargE shrI vanadurgE


anupallavi

 dundubhi vAdya bhEda nAda vinOdini mOdini vINAvAdini 
samvEdini abhEdini sundari shrIranjani niranjani jaya janani


caraNam   karuNA rasAlayE kali kalmaSa vilayE kara vidhrta kuvalayE kAnana 
nilayE caraNa kisalayE cAmIkara valayE svara sangItalayE surucira malayE 
guruguhOdayE sadayE vijayE abhayE sarasamayE SaT-samayE samayE kalayE
